title: FS: Lot of 6 T205s (PSA / SGC 4s/5) Bresnahan Hassan CYCLE $275
author: michael3322

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 6 T205s (PSA / SGC 4s/5) Bresnahan Hassan CYCLE $275
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone. I have decided after years of collecting, to sell my entire collection. Times are tight. So in the coming days, I will be listing all of my T's. Thanks in advance for your consideration. 

Here is the first batch.

Six T205s

J.T. Meyers, PSA 4.5 VG-EX+ (Hassan)
Freddy Parent, PSA 5(MK) EX (Piedmont)
Russell Blackburne, SGC 50 (4) VG/EX (CYCLE)
Harry Wolter, PSA 4 VG-EX (Hassan)
Clyde Milan, PSA 4 VG-EX (Hassan) 
HOF'er Roger Bresnahan (Closed Mouth), PSA 5(MK) EX (Piedmont)

I am selling them together as a lot for $275 (Paypal gift), and this includes padded packaged delivery in the US. For reference, I am a top-rated powerseller on eBay (michael3322), however their fees have gotten out of hand.

Thanks for looking. PM me if you are interested. First come, first serve.

Thank you.
